history.proof: intros. unfold dfun_lim. intro Hin. apply limP. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) H : x \\In s Hin : A Unable to unify "x \\In s" with "x Hin \\In dapp_chain s Hin".
In environment A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) H : x \\In s Hin : A Unable to unify "A" with "x Hin \\In dapp_chain s Hin".

original: intros. unfold dfun_lim. unfold dfun_lim in H. intro Hin. apply limP. apply H. apply Hin.
